channel.title: Berkyscape 508 disconnection problem
channel.description:
Im having a problem with berkyscape and all the sources made from it... or the one berky is made from not too sure.. BUT THE POINT IS i randomly disconnect from it. i would be training hunting or something and i would disconnect like i logged out (didnt have the "connection lost" sign). i would sign back on and i would log out a few minutes later. is this just because my computer sucks (which it doesn't) or a coding error. (NOTE: i didn't make any changes to it)
Thanks for your help

item.title: Berkyscape 508 disconnection problem
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

I don’t think you can fix it… 508’s are still glitching you know.

Read full topic
